projects.name: Uzuri K&Y
projects.description: UZURI K&Y is a footwear brand inspired by African culture with a contemporary touch and a recycled tire sole. I worked on it's E-commerce API.

projects.name: OX Rwanda Dashboard
projects.description: A system to help OX Rwanda to manage orders, sales and trucks. It also helps to generate reports, graphs and analytics for all the data.

projects.name: DBI Trust Seal certification system
projects.description: A System to manage Trust Seals to offer to credible e-commerce companies and serve as a credible mark for customer assurance.
